page.text: The next few steps serve as a quick start for all new Pythoneer that want to see PyTgCalls in action as fast as possible. Let’s go!

list.item: Install PyTgCalls with pip3 install -U py-tgcalls.
Choose your MtProto client between Pyrogram or Telethon.
Get your own Telegram API key from https://my.telegram.org/apps.

Open your best text editor and use the following:
from pytgcalls import PyTgCalls from pytgcalls import idle from pytgcalls.types import AudioPiped ... chat_id = -1001185324811 app = PyTgCalls(client) app.start() app.join_group_call( chat_id, AudioPiped( 'http://docs.evostream.com/sample_content/assets/sintel1m720p.mp4', ) ) idle()
Replace client and chat_id values with your own.
Watch PyTgCalls playing the audio file.
